UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents additional data for a user in MercaFlow Portal, linked to Firebase Authentication. Stores business information and user role.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity, corresponding to the Firebase Authentication UID.

businessName.description: The name of the client's business or organization.

contactName.description: The name of the primary contact person for the business.

email.description: The email address associated with the user's account.

phoneNumber.description: The contact phone number for the business.

streetAddress.description: The street address of the business.

city.description: The city of the business address.

state.description: The state or province of the business address.

zipCode.description: The postal code of the business address.

role.description: The role of the user within the application (client, admin, or superadmin).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the user profile was last updated.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product available for wholesale ordering in MercaFlow Portal.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Product entity.

description.description: A detailed description of the product.

imageUrl.description: URL to an image of the product.

stockQuantity.description: The current quantity of the product available in stock.

price.description: The wholesale price of one unit of the product.

category.description: The category the product belongs to (e.g., 'Frutas', 'Verduras').

unitOfMeasure.description: The unit in which the product is measured and sold (e.g., 'kg', 'lb', 'caja').

active.description: Indicates whether the product is currently active and available for purchase.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the product was added to the catalog.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the product details were last updated.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents a customer's order for products in MercaFlow Portal.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Order entity.

clientId.description: Reference to the UserProfile of the client who placed the order. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N Order)

orderDate.description: The date and time when the order was placed.

status.description: The current status of the order (e.g., 'pending', 'processing', 'shipped', 'delivered', 'cancelled').

totalAmount.description: The total monetary amount of the order, including all items.

shippingStreetAddress.description: The street address for shipping the order (snapshot at order time).

shippingCity.description: The city for shipping the order (snapshot at order time).

shippingState.description: The state or province for shipping the order (snapshot at order time).

shippingZipCode.description: The postal code for shipping the order (snapshot at order time).

deliveryDate.description: The estimated or actual date and time of delivery.

notes.description: Any additional notes or instructions for the order.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the order was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the order details were last updated.

OrderItem.title: OrderItem
OrderItem.description: Represents a single item within an order in MercaFlow Portal, detailing the product and quantity ordered.

id.description: Unique identifier for the OrderItem entity.

orderId.description: Reference to the Order this item belongs to. (Relationship: Order 1:N OrderItem)

productId.description: Reference to the Product being ordered. (Relationship: Product 1:N OrderItem)

productName.description: The name of the product at the time of order (denormalized for convenience).

quantity.description: The quantity of the product ordered.

unitPrice.description: The price per unit of the product at the time the order was placed (for historical accuracy).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the order item was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the order item details were last updated.
